DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect antiretroviral drug efavirenz ritonavir human brain LAAM disposition vivo .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Each subject must meet following criterion : 1 . Male nonpregnant female volunteer , 1850 yr old 2 . Good general health know major medical condition 3 . BMI < 33 4 . Provide informed consent Exclusion Criteria Subjects enrol follow criterion exist : 1 . Known history liver kidney disease 2 . History major medical condition 3 . HIV seropositive 4 . Fasting blood glucose > 110 mg/dl ( HAART cause glucose intolerance ) 5 . Family history type 2 diabetes 6 . Use prescription non prescription medication , herbal food know metabolized alter Pglycoprotein CYP3A ( hormonal birth control medication acceptable alternative mean contraception use ) 7 . Females pregnant nursing 8 . Females take hormonal contraceptive unwilling use alternative mean contraception 9 . Contraindications MRI ( e.g. , metal implant splinter body ; worn implant medical device , pacemaker drug pump ; inability lie flat one hour ; claustrophobia ) contraindication PET scan ( e.g. , inability lie flat one hour , claustrophobia , current 10 . Current recent ( within 12 month prior screen ) participation research study involve radiation exposure total researchrelated radiation dose subject give year would exceed limit set forth US Code Federal Regulations ( CFR ) Title 21 Section 361.1 ( http : //www.accessdata.fda.gov/scripts/cdrh/cfdocs/cfcfr/CFRSearch.cfm ? FR=361.1 ) )
